Introduction

Touched (or TOUCHED) is a four-member South Korean co-ed rock band. They won the grand prize at the 31st Yoo Jae Ha Music Contest for their song "Blue" in 2020. The band made their official debut with their 1st digital single "The Dawn Star" on January 21, 2021.

They later won the music competition Indiestance 2021. They also became the winner of the Mnet 2022 band survival show Great Seoul Invasion. They joined MPMG MUSIC and their record label Faction A Like after the show.

The band used to have five members, but their electric guitarist D.on left on December 5, 2023, for personal reasons.
